feed.title: Fact-Checked News
feed.subtitle: A curated collection of fact-verified news articles.

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-2864547126247160046.md
entry.content: A list of statistics showing the leading causes of death in the United States through June 2016 includes some questionable aspects.
entry.summary: A list of statistics showing the leading causes of death in the United States through June 2016 includes some questionable aspects.

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-3004411212928008815.md
entry.content: Online users shared a video allegedly showing the future U.S. president eyeing a young girl with Maxwell, a convicted sex trafficker, watching nearby.
entry.summary: Online users shared a video allegedly showing the future U.S. president eyeing a young girl with Maxwell, a convicted sex trafficker, watching nearby.

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-4349672278584982409.md
entry.content: A widely circulated rumor claimed Gunn had filed a $1 billion copyright infringement lawsuit.
entry.summary: A widely circulated rumor claimed Gunn had filed a $1 billion copyright infringement lawsuit.

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-5509158392669669474.md
entry.content: Error parsing claims: Error code: 503 - {‘error’: {‘message’: ‘Service unavailable. Visit https://groqstatus.com/ to see if there is an active incident.’, ‘type’: ‘internal_server_error’}}
entry.summary: Error parsing claims: Error code: 503 - {‘error’: {‘message’: ‘Service unavailable. Visit https://groqstatus.com/ to see if there is an active incident.’, ‘type’: ‘internal_server_error’}}

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-5576015019926419630.md
entry.content: More homicides in the U.S. are committed with baseball bats than with firearms?
entry.summary: More homicides in the U.S. are committed with baseball bats than with firearms?

entry.title: Claim 2025-07-15-8217946894176547685.md
entry.content: Posts that circulated on Facebook in July 2025 claimed ICE deported U.S. Marine Corps Sgt. Maj. Carlos Ruiz.
entry.summary: Posts that circulated on Facebook in July 2025 claimed ICE deported U.S. Marine Corps Sgt. Maj. Carlos Ruiz.
